item.description:
One of our members is having an exhibition of her work:

"Dirty Laundry & Clean Thoughts" paintings and installation by Eva Polonkai

She told me the venue is very cool warehouse space. It should be a nice show. Please invite as many people as you know to support one of our own.

350 Kinsley Ave

Friday 5pm – 9pm
Saturday 4pm – 8pm

I'm going to attempt to go on Friday at 5pm and make it to my Wickenden street meetup by 6:15. Otherwise I'll be there Saturday night. Or maybe both.
item.name: Dirty Laundry & Clean Thoughts - Art Opening
